title: 500cc
description: Allows you to set the speed of karts at 500CC
author: DarkFlare
other: Only works on 200cc or online 150cc.

title: Always In Star Effect
description: Gives you the star effect all the time
author: Megabyte918

title: Always boost on race start
description: Allows you to always start the game with a boosted start
author: Megabyte918
other: Boosts at the maximum distance at the start. Only works if you do not hold accelerate until after you have boosted otherwise you will blow out.

title: Always in anti-gravity
description: Allows permanent activation of anti-gravity mode
author: Megabyte918

other:
This code will allow you to replace any amiibo suit that is enabled, at least you will need a suit enabled to replace it with any of the suits available in the game, to apply this code you will need to do the following:
 
1 - Enter the game of Mario Kart 8.
2 - In the selection menu of the game press the + button, this is to enter the menu Mii Racing Suits.
3 - In the menu of Mii Racing Suits apply the code.
4 - When you select your mii and the suit you have modified, it will be replaced by the suit you have chosen.

Replace L's with your desired suit:

105B49F0 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Mario
105B49F4 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Luigi
105B49F8 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Yoshi
105B49FC = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Peach
105B4A00 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Toad
105B4A04 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Donkey Kong
105B4A08 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Bowser
105B4A0C = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Wario
105B4A10 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Captain Falcon
105B4A14 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Fox McCloud
105B4A18 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Samus Aran
105B4A1C = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Link
105B4A24 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Kirby
105B4A28 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Rosalina
105B4A2C = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Pikmin
105B4A30 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Animal Crossing
105B4A34 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit PAC-MAN
105B4A38 = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Mega Man
105B4A3C = Amiibo Mii Racing Suit Sonic

title: Banana Size Modifier
description: Modifies the size of bananas
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with your desired value. Hitbox size is directly proportionate to the banana's size.
00000000 -> Invisible
3F800000 -> Normal
3E800000 -> Small
40000000 -> Big
41000000 -> Extra Big

title: Blue Shell Size Modifier
description: Modifies the size of blue shells
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Also effects the size of explosions.

Replace L's with your desired value.
00000000 -> Invisible
3F800000 -> Normal
3E800000 -> Small
40000000 -> Big
41000000 -> Extra Big

title: Bob-omb No Damage Explosion
description: Disables explosion caused by bob-omb
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: Boomerang Deleter
author: Lüî§35000vr
other: This code deletes the boomerang thrown by any player, you will never receive damage by this item.

title: Boomerang Size Modifier
description: Modifies the size of boomerang
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with your desired value.
00000000 -> Invisible
3F800000 -> Normal
3E800000 -> Small
40000000 -> Big
41000000 -> Extra Big

title: Bullet Bill Controller
author: Mega-Mew
other:
Replace X's with desired controller address and replace Y's with desired button activator.
https://github.com/Megabyte918/MK8-Memory-Notes/blob/master/ACTIVATORS.md for more info.

title: Coin Size Modifier
description: Modifies the size of coins
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with your desired value.
00000000 -> Invisible
3F800000 -> Normal
3E800000 -> Small
40000000 -> Big
41000000 -> Extra Big

title: Fire Ball Effect Modifier
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with your desired value.
00000000 = The fire balls will jump backward and forward.
3F800000 = The fire balls will stay static until disappearing.
47000000 = The fire balls freeze your Wii U (and freeze anyone nearby's Wii U?)

title: Fire Ball Speed Modifier
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with your desired value.
00000000 -> No Speed
40000000 -> Double Speed
41000000 -> Max Speed

title: Freeze all CPU's
author: CosmoCortney & DarkFlare
other: Freezes all CPU's. (offline only)

title: Gamma Modifier
author: Divengerss
other:
Allows you to change the gamma of your game but also changes the size of the screen
when you leave a party or you start again.

Replace L's with your desired value.
3FE00000 = Bright
3F800000 = Normal
3FD9999A = x1.7
3F000000 = Dark
3DCCCCCD = Very Dark

title: Grand Prix Complete
description: Gives every cup a gold trophy + 3 stars
author: 3dsiziritai

title: Invisible Bob-omb Explosion
description: Deletes the explosions of the Bob-omb, however the explosions still cause damage
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: Jumping Bob-omb
description: Gives the effect of continuous jumping to Bomb-Ombs when being thrown
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: Jumping Fire Ball
description: This code offers an effect of continuous jumping when throwing fire balls
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: Jumping Red & Blue Shell
description: Gives the effect of continuous jumping to red and blue shells when being thrown
author: Lüî§35000vr
other: Gives the effect of continuous jumping to red and blue shells when being thrown, Also has the effect of deleting the sensor of detecting the blue shell. The blue shell will continue its route without detecting the first player.

title: Kart Size Modifier
description: Allows you to change the size of the kart
author: Megabyte918
other:
Only applies to kart, not the player within the kart

Replace L's with your desired value.
3C000000 = No Kart
3F800000 = Normal Size Kart
40000000 = Double Size Kart
41000000 = 8x Size Kart
42000000 = 32x Size Kart
43000000 = 128x Size Kart
44000000 = 512x Size Kart

title: Kill Lakitu
description: This code eliminates the annoying lakitu that appears when the player drives backwards.
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: Lakitu Size Modifier
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with desired value.

00000000 -> Invisib
3DC00000 -> Sma
3F800000 -> Norm
40000000 -> B
41000000 -> Extra Big

title: Max Red & Blue Shell Speed
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with desired value.

3F8F0000 -> Increases the speed of red and blue shells when being thrown.
40000000 -> You will have the possibility to control the blue shell, you will be able of hit players if they are near you.

title: No Blooper Ink on Screen
description: This code deletes the blooper effect on the player's screen, but still maintains the effect of the ink
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: No Item Indicator & Position
description: Removes the item indicator and the position number shown in-game
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: No Lightningbolt Flash
description: This code deletes the flash & sky darknening effects when throwing lightning
author: Lüî§35000vr

title: No Music
author: Divengerss
other:
Replace L's with the desired value

3F800000 -> Music On
3FE00000 -> Music Off

title: No Object Collision
description: Player will not collide with objects on the track
author: Megabyte918

title: No lightning damage
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with the desired value

00000000 -> The damage caused by lightning doesn't reduce of size to the player, this effect deletes the lightning when it is thrown (only takes effect if you are in first place).

FFFFFFFF -> The damage caused by lightning maintains reduced of size of the player, the only way to return to normal size is using a bullet bill.

title: Red & Blue Shell Effect Modifier
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with the desired value

3F000000 -> Red and blue shells will stay static when being thrown, blue shells will stay static for
some seconds and then will move slowly.
40E00000 -> Increases the speed of red and blue shells when being thrown.
41000000 -> You will have the possibility to control the blue shell, you will be able of hit players if they are near you.
F0F00000 -> Throw Red Shell or Blue Shell to Freeze Wii U (and anyone nearby's Wii U?)

title: Shell Size Modifier
author: Lüî§35000vr
other:
Replace L's with your desired value.

3F000000 -> Half Size
3F800000 -> Normal Size
40000000 -> Double Size
41000000 -> 8x Size

title: Speed hack
other:
It applies to all players!

Replace L's with your desired value.
Normal -> 3F800000
SpeedHack -> 3F810000
Speed of light -> 3F890000

title: Unlock Everything
author: DarkFlare, BullyWiiPlaza, Mega-Mew, & Others
other:
Replace L's with user slot.
40000 -> User 1
46800 -> User 2
4D000 -> User 3
53800 -> User 4
5A000 -> User 5
60800 -> User 6

title: Weird Animations
author: Megabyte918
other:
Replaces LLLLLLLL with the desired value
3F800000 -> Normal Animations
41000000 -> 8x Animations
42000000 -> 32x Animations
43000000 -> 128x Animations
44000000 -> 512x Animations
45000000 -> 2048x Animations
